message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 6-6-1a, translated into en
data: UNEP was awarded the mandate of custodian agency for SDG indicator 6.6.1 by the Inter-agency and Expert Group on SDG Indicators. In its capacity as custodian, UNEP are responsible for the development of the internationally comparable monitoring methodology and metadata, with national data, and regional and global aggregations reported to the SDG global data base and these statistics included in the Secretary Generals SDG progress reports.
